website_summaries.verdict: The top choice for those looking for an attractive and durable mosquito net that travels well.
pros: Folds down well for easy storage
Comes with a case for portability
Two entries, so you can get out of bed without disturbing your partner
cons: The two-entry design can make it difficult to keep both entries sealed

customer_reviews.title: BEAUTIFUL
customer_reviews.text: This canopy looks BEYOND AMAZING over my bed. I love that it has the ribbon accent to it. It also stays up at night. I just push it out of the way so I don’t roll over it ! But it is quite large so I’m sure it would fit over a king size bed just as well. My bed is a full size. I also included the size of hole it leaves if you end up moving it. If you’re installing alone, I recommend screwing the piece in just a tad and hanging the canopy to see if it’s the right place before screwing it in all of the way.
customer_reviews.author: Nym

customer_reviews.title: Balcony view with new mosquito net
customer_reviews.text: Finally got the mosquito net up for summer. The carabiner clip is part of the kit and made it easier to hang. Best thing is that I can see clearly through the net, since the mesh is so fine, I am able to enjoy my balcony view. Plus, keeps the buzzing bugs away.
customer_reviews.author: Leslie

customer_reviews.title: Lifesaver
customer_reviews.text: Great storage bag and follow up customer service. Here in Puerto Rico we were hit very hard by Hurricane Maria and tomorrow, Nov 20th 2017, we mark our 60th day without electric power in over 50% of the Island. After the hurricane we are having heavy rains and mosquitoes have thrived. The Aedes Aegipti carry Dengue, Zika and Chicungunya. Your Mosquito Net has been a lifesaver, probably literally.
customer_reviews.author: PublicFigure

customer_reviews.title: Feel like a princess, get this canopy!
customer_reviews.text: I am not a handy person, but this canopy was very easy to install! It's very light weight and comes with a portable storage case. It's a very simple and clean canopy, of good quality. The "mosquito net" quality initially made me wary: however, it's a very fine netting that still looks elegant. I have lights hanging behind my bed, and the canopy in front of them creates a subtle and soft glow. I love this canopy, and 100% recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Meghan

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Awesome quality and super easy to hang. Looks great in my daughters nursery. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Kasey Marie King

customer_reviews.title: Horrible smell inhibits breathing
customer_reviews.text: I had to return this. I couldn't be inside this net without it becoming instantly difficult to breathe. My daughter would being sneezing immediately. Also leaves a noticeable smell in the room. I left this for a couple weeks and this problem persisted. Neither of us has any kind of respiratory disorder, though I do have a sensitive sense of smell. Replaced with a seventy-dollar cotton model from another web site. Unsurprisingly, no respiratory problems with that one. My wife, a long-time (but no longer) smoker, who can't smell anything and likes the smell of ammonia hair dye, didn't have any problem with this though
customer_reviews.author: Frequent Purchaser

customer_reviews.title: One on each side for easy access. We just have to pull it back ...
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this to protect our bed from stinkbugs. We were tired of sleeping in fear as the bugs flew around the room. This covers our king size bed and has two openings. One on each side for easy access. We just have to pull it back and tuck it behind the headboard when we make our bed because we have two dogs and one cat that jump on the bed. As long as we tuck it behind the headboard the pets do not get caught in the netting. It attached easily to the ceiling and we were careful to position it away from our ceiling fan. Does a great job as a barrier to those rotten stink bugs.
customer_reviews.author: Martha G.

customer_reviews.title: Good for camping, not designed well for Home esthetics
customer_reviews.text: The ring portion that hangs above the bed is much smaller than pictured and doesn’t create a wide enough reach for the materiality easily cover the whole bed, it becomes VERY narrow at the top and doesn’t drape the fabric around the bed well, it’s a little suffocating compared to others I’ve had, I wish I’d bought a different one. Very practical for campaign my but not well designed for in-Home use...doesn’t drape well as shown in photo, considering returning it.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah h green

customer_reviews.title: Great Product + Packaging, Aside from Initial Factory Smell
customer_reviews.text: We really need to do more to improve products so that they don't have off-gassing smells from the factory. My husband said it's just "camping smell" but I know better and I think it's the nylon material off gassing. I soaked it in some Thieves cleaner and vinegar, left it out to air dry which improved it significantly. Just want it safe for family. Will go over our bed! Drapes nicely, easy to hang. Can be fastened with push pins if you want to adjust it near the walls.
customer_reviews.author: Courtney

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: I highly recommend this net and the company. Great communication and their interest in making sure the product meets customer expectations. I can say the net definitely meets and exceeds all expectations I had. It's beautiful soft netting, well sewn and has a border. This will save the net from normal wear and tear across the bottom. I really appreciate the bag for when I need to store it and the hanging hook. The rope and hanging attachments are great, allows to hang securely at any height needed. This was a great option for me since I have 12' ceilings in bedroom. Thank you for a solid product at a great price.
customer_reviews.author: Tamtastic

customer_reviews.title: A great mosquito net
customer_reviews.text: A great mosquito net. I am very allergic to mosquito bites, so I keep a net around my bed from spring to autumn. I only have a twin bed, but I love that the hoop is wide enough that the fabric doesn't drape on me at all and wake me up at night. It had satin fabric stitched all along the bottom, which also helps to weigh the fabric down and keep its shape, so it doesn't dip down in the middle. I haven't gotten any mosquito bites yet (knock on wood!)
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: This one is not like the others
customer_reviews.text: I bought 3 different brands just to compare them. With the foldable ring and overlapping entrance, they are mostly them same. This net has a few "premium" features that set it apart. I especially like the zipper bag (but be careful to keep the net out of the zipper). You could definitely live without these features, but they're nice to have. And the price is middle of the pack. So value for money, I think this is the winner.
customer_reviews.author: Ronbow

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install
customer_reviews.text: I very much like this and can’t wait to decorate it with lights .Had an issue with long gray string in how to hide it a bit but it’s resolved now .I just rolled it inside the hook that attaches to the wall if anyone wants an idea that was mine ! Or I hear u can change the dark gray string.. overall I am very happy with my purchase ✨
customer_reviews.author: Karen Butterfly

customer_reviews.title: as advertised
customer_reviews.text: It is what it is. A hanging net. Light. Hanges easy, as a nail in the roof does. The quick release would work if it was together I imagine, how to get it to work is another story as there were no instructions so i just tied it in a knot. No complaints. Would be nice if it included a way to fasten to ceiling. I just bent a nail. Easy enough.
customer_reviews.author: darrin

customer_reviews.title: Unique Purpose in Mind
customer_reviews.text: So I bought 4 of these to keep out bugs, but not from beds. I'm having an outdoor wedding and trying to come up with a pretty way to protect food tables while keeping to a budget was important to me. These are gorgeous, you can hang a light from the center to illuminate the tables and it has a romantic look. Beautiful option for what I need!
customer_reviews.author: p. kean

customer_reviews.title: As far as I'm concerned, its perfect.
customer_reviews.text: I love this mosquito net the best. I have other ones, but they don't have dual openings like this one, so that you can get out of bed on either side. I love the way the net overlaps at the openings so that its easy to open and close perfectly. I like the heavy duty edging on the bottom of the net too. I am so glad I discovered this one.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia R. Schlosser

customer_reviews.title: Bye Bye Mosquitos, I can sleep now
customer_reviews.text: We ordered this Mosquito Net right after Hurricane Irma hit Puerto Rico, we could not have imagined that a second hurricane will hit our island right after leaving us without electrical power and exposed a big insect invasion. The net has worked perfectly and kept us save and mosquito free up till now, 3 months and still going. We just got 2 more for our children's bedrooms, they will be visiting soon. We recommend this product 100%, it is made with good material and no toxic or plastic smell. Delivery was fast and secure. We made a good choice. Thank You.
customer_reviews.author: VVV

customer_reviews.title: Mosquito Netting.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this netting because I found a bat in my bedroom. I couldn't sleep at night until I received this netting. Now I can sleep at night without fear of a bat landing on me. We took care of the bat situation but I still sleep under my net. Love it. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Linda K. Rowley

customer_reviews.title: It fits into a tiny bag
customer_reviews.text: I have used this net several times. But getting it back into that tiny bag afterwards mystified me until i got a little help from youtube. The net hangs down from a springy metal loop about 2 feet in diameter, which you need to fold in half and then fold the ends in. The middle then separates and it suddenly becomes 3 small circles. Then just wrap the material around it and stuff it in the tiny bag which looks like durable nylon with a zipper. The net comes with a little hook and anchor bolt for hanging it from the ceiling, but i did it an easy way and tied it to one blade of my ceiling fan.
customer_reviews.author: gio

customer_reviews.title: Set up confusing.
customer_reviews.text: So, this came earlier than expected and I’m opening this right now. It claims set up is “so easy, a toddler could do it,” so there’s no instructions. I’m a confused how to hang it and I know I didn’t do it correctly but I made it work. For that reason it gets 4 stars. Looks beautiful. Everything I expected
customer_reviews.author: Erin

customer_reviews.title: And when my aunt was able to get service on her cell phone she raved that it was not only useful but beautiful
customer_reviews.text: I bought this mosquito net for my aunt and uncle who are suffering the weather in Puerto Rico these days. It’s the only thing out of everything that I shipped them that actually arrived. And when my aunt was able to get service on her cell phone she raved that it was not only useful but beautiful. This was a purchase of necessity and the fact that is was also beautiful aided in there recovery after this hurricane.
customer_reviews.author: Iralma Osorio Sorondo

customer_reviews.title: Product integrity is top notch!
customer_reviews.text: This is a beautiful product and it comes inside a carrying case. I use this to dress up a room but if I was going to be camping I would bring it with me. The mesh is so soft and yet sturdy. I've not had any tears or rips and its been hanging up for months. I really respect the integrity of this product because on closer inspection you can see how fine the weave is.
customer_reviews.author: Shelton_50

customer_reviews.title: Good Net
customer_reviews.text: This is a good mosquito net. I live in the British Virgin Islands and I bought it to protect against mosquitos after Hurricanes Irma and Maria. It does the job quite well. My only complaint is that the side openings do not overlap very well, and this allows mosquitos to enter. I solved this by using clothespins. All in all, a good purchase and worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: CTSO

customer_reviews.title: The style is nice. But mosquitoes managed to squeeze through the one ...
customer_reviews.text: The style is nice. But mosquitoes managed to squeeze through the one of the entries and the material at the bottom made it hard to tuck in the net into the mattress.
customer_reviews.author: ale

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT over my queen-size bed! Very cute:)
customer_reviews.text: I love it! I was worried it was going to look childish but it looks great! It’s huge and it took me about .2 seconds to hang it up, and to hang my star lamp inside of it. Definitely worth the price. Thank you so much!!
customer_reviews.author: Carley McAuliffe

customer_reviews.title: Entrances leave gaps for mosquitoes.
customer_reviews.text: After 6 months of use in Africa I am very disappointed with this product. The two openings are a liability with this net. All too often they will leave a gap for mosquitoes to enter regardless of the bed size defeating the purpose of a mosquito net. They look good, easy to assemble and adjust, however the flawed entrance design needs to be fixed. Don’t rely on this product to prevent mosquitoes at night. All too often have woken up with bites and found mosquitoes in the net by morning, so as anything other than a decorative net try elseware.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality,  Luxury Mosquito Netting
customer_reviews.text: A. mosquito, I have lovingly nicknamed "The Lone Ranger" was making my life a living hell at night . I would wake up in the morning to find as many as 4 or 5 bites on my arms...and other places. Yoir mosquito netting not only put an end to the nocturnal raids of The Lone Ranger's on my innocent, unarmed body but lent a touch of class to an otherwise ordinary looking bedroom. It was easy to install as everything you need is included in the cute little round bag it is shipped in. Thank you Timbuktoo Mosquito Netting now I can sleep in peace and my bedroom looks pretty cool.
customer_reviews.author: Yvonne Lewis

customer_reviews.title: This net is just good for decoration
customer_reviews.text: This net is just good for decoration, I brought it to west africa to protect my son at night;and when we wake up in the morning there is always like 3or 4 mosquitos in the net... I have no Idae how they are getting in, very dissatisfied I posted pictures of the mosquitos that I killed inside the net
customer_reviews.author: Rokyatu Kiawu

customer_reviews.title: Very very strong and well packaged.
customer_reviews.text: Honestly when i bought this net i was expecting a net that was just for looks but it actually serves very well for not only style but also functionality. I live in a college dorm and we keep having a reoccurring gnat and fly problem and this net does a wonderful job at keeping the bugs away while i sleep soundly under my net. The net comes with a ceiling hook for hanging it off the ceiling and patches for if you happen to rip a hole in the netting. Since i am in a dorm however i found using a strong command hook works just as well for hanging the net off the ceiling.
customer_reviews.author: cody

customer_reviews.title: The mosquito nets arrived on time. Each has its ...
customer_reviews.text: The mosquito nets arrived on time. Each has its own ripstop zippered case. The holes in the nets are smaller than in the ones that I have been using. The circular tube and construction were carefully designed. On removal from case, it opens beautifully. These are excellent, carefully and generously constructed to provide years of use. I especially appreciate the fine, durable edge reinforcements.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic for making a princess canopy!
customer_reviews.text: You can’t beat the price on this net. I chose this over a traditional princess canopy due to #1cost, #2 durability. I added some fairy lights and viola! Our child’s room was a mess due to Christmas however this picture shows the beauty of the lights.
customer_reviews.author: ammillernails

customer_reviews.title: Great mosquito net!
customer_reviews.text: This net is quite an innovation! I have yet to learn how to fold the ring but I am sure in time I will get the hang of it. The double openings are brilliant. Also very satisfied with the quality of the fabric. I wish you did these custom made as I need one for a rectangular queen sized bed.
customer_reviews.author: Marina Lampkin

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: I love this! It adds a sort of elegance to my room and makes my bed look even more prettier. Perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Kou L.

customer_reviews.title: You better get one if you're sick of the mosquitoes bites!
customer_reviews.text: I'm done being attacked by mosquitoes. Finally! I was dousing my body with mosquito repellent and it still wasn't working. I live in California we have a new species of mosquitoes here that are from Africa and they are known as ankle-biters. Well they bit me all over the place! But, since installing this net, that is over. Best purchase of the entire year! You better get one because the viruses and diseases that come from those bugs are no joke and neither are those toxic repellents.
customer_reviews.author: Janet Butler

customer_reviews.title: THIS IS THE ONE FOR ME!!!
customer_reviews.text: An amazing product for an amazing price. It literally took me under 3 minutes to set up. The coverage of the net completely encompasses my bed and having two access points helps immensely. Finally for the first time I can sleep without having the pesky high pitched whine of a mosquito buzzing in my ear, that would wake me up in the middle of the night. For the price, and quality you cannot go wrong. Well constructed and it came packaged in a zippered carry-all bag in case you ever need to take it with you on camping trips, Etc. I would definitely buy again and I highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Secured.

customer_reviews.title: Great idea for storing the net when not in use
customer_reviews.text: Whoah! Just received my first Timbuktoo Mosquito Net! I am so impressed by the packaging. Great idea for storing the net when not in use. It is practical and beautiful. This net is really "de luxe" as written on the label. Very well made. Nigel sent me additional instructions via email which we so appreciated. I ordered two of them for our villa in Africa. I am ecstatic. Can't wait to try it out as they are so much better than our old standard net. I can see that right away. Never going back. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: route66

customer_reviews.title: Not as nice looking
customer_reviews.text: It's nice and big, but it's super white, not a nice soft white. It's also very plasticy, and at the bottom ends is a border of polyester plastic type. It makes noise when you touch it or when it moves. It is certainly not as nice as pictured in the photo. I am going to use for now, but I would not buy this again. Very prompt delivery and service.
customer_reviews.author: Monique Logtenberg

customer_reviews.title: Mosquito protector
customer_reviews.text: My husband does field contract work in Alaska and he bought this to protect himself from the mosquitoes while he sleeps. I’m sure this thing is going to work beautifully, super light weight.
customer_reviews.author: Tracy

customer_reviews.title: Yay for bed canopies!
customer_reviews.text: This was purchased to be used in an opera production as a bed canopy! It is so easy to use, and so beautiful that it works perfectly for this staged show. We needed something sturdy enough to be moved often on and off stage, but still look elegant. This fit what we needed very well. So, this is not a review as a mosquito net, but rather a review for a touch of elegance needed on stage! By the way--they worked so well we ordered three of them!
customer_reviews.author: C

customer_reviews.title: Excellent mosquito net!!
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy with this mosquito net. It is large, easy to get in and out of, looks nice, is well made, easy to set up, and best of all it keeps the nasty biting bugs off of me. My skin is finally healing from so many previous bites. I would buy this again for a friend!
customer_reviews.author: jeanne

customer_reviews.title: Awesome net. But not washable.
customer_reviews.text: Not washable, the ring doesn't come off of the net. One month in a dirty jungle and its brown and gross looking.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It works! Its amazing!
customer_reviews.text: We would not be able to sleep without this mosquito net over our bed. The mosquitoes have been relentless the past few years. We had purchased one prior and loved it so much, however our dogs ripped it up, so we bought 2, the one we use and a backup just in case.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: No  more annoying mosquitoes or flies!!!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love, love, love my Timbuktoo Mosquito Nets Luxury Mosquito NET. It is just what I needed and wanted!!! When the "mosquito meter" reads high In this region( Yes we really have one that is a part of our daily TV Weather report) .. I pull out my netting and throw it over my beach umbrella and sit under it quite comfortably eating my breakfast, lunch, dinner or just reading and relaxing!!! Thank you Chaplain TL Jackson
customer_reviews.author: Thel L Jackson

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Product!
customer_reviews.text: Great mosquito net! Set up in 60 seconds or less! Just added a hook above the bed to hang it from and attached quickly. Generous length on all sides for a King sized bed (ordered the king size). Doesn't drape over our faces at all. I love the handy storage case it comes in. Super light weight for packing around. I highly recommend this product, unbeatable value for the price!
customer_reviews.author: Rhonda Holden

customer_reviews.title: Awesome purchase !<3
customer_reviews.text: So at this price I was planning on using this for camping, burning man, or anywhere outdoors to add a eutheral and unique feel BUT it's so beautifully done and expensive looking I'm thinking of putting it above my bed for full time use. Another plus is the compact case and how easy it is to carry with you. Great purchase & would recommend. Also I bought this for full price, hopefully they read this and send me a coupon because I would buy another lol
customer_reviews.author: Natasha

customer_reviews.title: Dont buy for everyday use or for a kids bed it wont last
customer_reviews.text: So we got this and it doesn't look like the picture! The material was very greasy feeling and smelled horrible, even after airing it out for a while. Also the clip that holds it up broke after using for about 2 weeks and I tried to use only the string and it falls at least a foot every night
customer_reviews.author: Christin Buckles

customer_reviews.title: I was surprised and delighted with this Mosquito net - my first ever purchase ...
customer_reviews.text: I was surprised and delighted with this Mosquito net - my first ever purchase of one and did not know what to expect. It is exactly as advertised and fits over my elevated queen size bed with plenty of room to spare. It was easy to install and is surprisingly easy to get use to. The design is well thought out and I particularly like the silkiness of the fabric and the entrance on each side of the bed. Great value and a great product. And now during mosquito season - I get to sleep through the night! Wish I had thought of this years ago.
customer_reviews.author: Gina Donato

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size for a king bed
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size for a king bed. Used it for its true purpose since I have mosquitoes flying around in my apt during the summer time. Positive that it looks pretty good too.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The beauty and quality.
customer_reviews.text: What a Delight ! After ordering the 1st one, It was so beautiful I ordered another and have them draped elegantly over my king size bed.
customer_reviews.author: Ellen Wold

customer_reviews.title: The smell of it.
customer_reviews.text: It’s nice and fits king perfectly BUT the smell of it is awful. I sprayed it , added dryer sheets but the odor is awful. Not sure if I can stand it. May have to go back.
customer_reviews.author: Liana Grabowski

customer_reviews.title: Nice Product of quality
customer_reviews.text: I received my net in a nice sealed bag with materials to hang it. It is very nice. I like the ribbon on the edges. It does make my bed look nicer. I will buy it again once I get furniture for my other bedroom.
customer_reviews.author: La Tisa Weaver

customer_reviews.title: The net is very light and the easily packable. Super easy to set up and no ...
customer_reviews.text: We got our Mosquito net in 2 days (wasn't scheduled to come for 7). The net is very light and the easily packable. Super easy to set up and no mosquitos got through - so sleep was peaceful thanks to Timbuktoo quality and design. We would handily recommend this product. By the way, we took this mosquito net to subsaharan Africa - with lots of mosquitos and malaria, we needed a good product and we got one!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased
customer_reviews.text: Although I purchased this product for practical purposes, I was delighted to find that it is beautiful as well. The satin ribbon at the entry points really help me to find my way out when I'm too sleepy to properly focus and add a touch of elegance. The netting weight is fine enough to keep out bugs while still allowing good air circulation. And the net completely covers my queen size bed with enough room so I don't feel trapped.
customer_reviews.author: Holly C.

customer_reviews.title: Obvious it’s for camping
customer_reviews.text: You can tell this is for camping because it comes with a paracord to hang it and it opens on both 2 sides. The material just isn’t very nice. Not meant for bed. It was cheap though so maybe it’s worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Keirra Evans

customer_reviews.title: worth the money
customer_reviews.text: for a net at this price, no problems, I see people complained about the smell, we put a fan on ours after putting up, smell went away in a couple hours instead of a couple days, we added weights to 4 corners at bottom, makes it a lot better...
customer_reviews.author: connie munoz

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous
customer_reviews.text: Already put together and the ribbon on the ends adds a nice touch. Just wish there was another layer or netting or lace or something on the top to cover the loop a bit more but really a not an issue. I hooked a black canopy I got from bed bath and beyond inside the white one here to match the room a little and make it less see-through but it the same size and material, just without the ribbon feature on the ends
customer_reviews.author: Michaelia Kelley

customer_reviews.title: Great quality net I recommend
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my daughters room. It’s beautiful, keeps the mosquitoes out, and it’s sturdy because our dogs jump on it often when they go in to wake her and it’s all still in one piece!
customer_reviews.author: Petra Romer

customer_reviews.title: Overall ok
customer_reviews.text: Product was very easy to manage and looks great. The onlyside is that there is no closure mecanism for unite the sides and stays open.
customer_reviews.author: Zenaida Acevedo

customer_reviews.title: So much fun!
customer_reviews.text: I've had lots of fun with this netting but it does rip easily! I've had to patch quite a few holes but will probably order again.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to hang and very effective.
customer_reviews.text: This was very easy to hang up, and the overlapping entries on both sides made it easy to get in and out without letting in bugs. Tested in a drafty cabin in the upper peninsula of michigan, where I would find hundreds of mosquitoes waiting on the net each morning. Only one of them ever got in, and i think that one rode in on my back. Also durable enough that it didn't snag or catch in 2 weeks of daily use.
customer_reviews.author: D.H

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful canopy, best for king size beds.
customer_reviews.text: Overall, I like the canopy. However, I wish the circle Loop was a bit smaller. I decided to open the loop and make it smaller myself. Also, the string is really long at the top. You can adjust the hook as needed, but I ended up cutting the string.
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: Very light and easy to install
customer_reviews.text: Very light and easy to install. Price is also reasonable. I like dual opening. Thanks to Timbuktoo mosquito net that my husband and I can have a good night sleep without chasing mosquitoes.I am very pleased with this purchase, I wish I had thought of it before. Thank you, timbuktoo and thank you amazon!
customer_reviews.author: RG

customer_reviews.title: Great net, super deal!
customer_reviews.text: I am already impressed. The net arrived in a practical and stylish ripstop carrying case that I'm already enjoying. I've had a life time of experience with nets so my keen eye was quick to note this net as top notch. The hoop is bigger than most which means my partner and I won't be fighting for the center of the bed to escape the sides. The hoop folds down to 1/3 of the size for easy storing and traveling. I appreciating having two entries as well as the reinforced hem since goodness knows unfinished hems snag on everything. Won't face that issue with this net. Customer service follow up was swell.
customer_reviews.author: Hillary Dawson

customer_reviews.title: Great netting.
customer_reviews.text: The netting is really nice and it looks so pretty over my sister's bed. She was absolutely thrilled and thought the netting was perfect. Made with good material and will actually fit over a king size bed. I love the satin finishes on the hem.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Scroggins

customer_reviews.title: This is a quality product
customer_reviews.text: Company arrived at my house in their motorhome during mosquito season. The net was perfect. It set up super easy and kept them from being eaten alive. It arrived in two days even though being ordered on a weekend.
customer_reviews.author: Susan M

customer_reviews.title: Life saver!
customer_reviews.text: This was a life saver when our house was infested with mosquitoes during remodeling. I am tempted to find a use for it while camping too!
customer_reviews.author: Stillguth

customer_reviews.title: it worked great, fantastic
customer_reviews.text: Bought this net to for my some to take on his month long vacation to Jamaica, it worked great, fantastic. He gets welts when bitten, then the welts break out in sores. This net was a great protection.
customer_reviews.author: Valued Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works Great!
customer_reviews.text: We live in a Malaria rich country. These nets fit on every bed and keep the mosquitoes out no problem. They are even aesthetically pleasing which is a fabulous bonus, unlike other droopy mosquito nets.
customer_reviews.author: Stacy Irvine

customer_reviews.title: Simple design
customer_reviews.text: I like that it is easy to install and use. The only thing that is not ideal is that it doesn’t seem to fit my queen bed completely. It rides up the end of the bed. It works perfectly though and is a good price. It is also easy to pack up and travel with because it comes with a carrying case.
customer_reviews.author: Judy Reed

customer_reviews.title: I have a queen size bed and it flushes nicely over it
customer_reviews.text: My family loves it. The mesh is so tightly woven that fan breeze can hardly enter. The only regret. I have a queen size bed and it flushes nicely over it. I believe it would also works well with a king size bed
customer_reviews.author: M J.

customer_reviews.title: Amazing quality
customer_reviews.text: Love this product! Bought this for my step daughters room to go over her toddler bed and she loves it. It’s really big and she can def grow into it as her beds change with age . It’s made very well and comes in a nice package .. it also includes the nail and hook for you to hang it which is pretty awesome .. I would def recomend this product to anyone ..
customer_reviews.author: krystal

customer_reviews.title: No mor mosquitos in my hot tub
customer_reviews.text: When I un packaged and took outside initially my husband was irritated at yet again another "Amazon sencless purchase" but we enjoyed the hot tub with no bugs tonight and he recanted.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Definitely Recommend!!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this net to hang over my daughters crib. It not only does the job perfectly but it looks beautiful. It makes her crib and room look more like it belongs to a princess. I love the splash of decor it gives. I am beyond satisfied with my purchase and would DEFINITELY recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Hannah Schweitzer

customer_reviews.title: Easiest Screen to Install
customer_reviews.text: From unwrapping it to installation it took me 5 minutes. The screen is of good quality and we are ready for this years mosquito season. Bring it on. The only improvement we would recommend is perhaps hanging very light weights to the screen to keep it taunt around the bed at night. Not a big deal....still a great value. We recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Friedrich

customer_reviews.title: very nice
customer_reviews.text: love it. I like to sleep with all window open and it does the job. easy install, nice looking. Make you feel (almost) on vacation in a far away land.....
customer_reviews.author: Pierre TinelTop Contributor: Photography

customer_reviews.title: A malaria free night!
customer_reviews.text: I don't know how I managed to do without a mosquito net for as long as I have! This particular net works with my king size bed, be sure to position the net directly overhead otherwise the net will drape over your face. It is a light-duty constructon, and fairly delicate netting, so for the price it is bargain if you only need a net for 2 months a year like I do.
customer_reviews.author: Rio Silvernail

customer_reviews.title: Saved me from being a critter snack!
customer_reviews.text: Saved me from being eaten alive in new job abroad, gives me comfort to sleep easy now. Definitely recommended. Thankyou!
customer_reviews.author: D A CONNELL

customer_reviews.title: PERFECTION!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is too beautiful for words!! I have always wanted on since watching the Movie "Eve's Bayou"!! It is even more pretty in person, pictures do not do enough justice. I recommend this product!!
customer_reviews.author: Marlene C.

customer_reviews.title: Happy Sleepers
customer_reviews.text: Purchased 5 king size mosquito net for Welcoming Vibes Guest House in Tressure Beach, Jamaica. First time to buy your brand. Timbuktu is a better net. Bigger. Better constructed than last brand. I have slept happily under it for 2 nights. Other guests are also happier having Timbuktoo net protecting them. We are not running around trying to borrow medicine for the inching. Thank you for your fine product!! MaryAnn from Chicago Vacationing in Treasure Beach, Jamaica
customer_reviews.author: Maryann

customer_reviews.title: Very happy. It looks wonderful!
customer_reviews.text: Great product!! We are really happy with our purchase since it is as described if not better. The net is super easy to install and my daugther absolutely loves the net over her bed, since it instantly gives her the princess canopy look she desperately wanted. Perfect!!
customer_reviews.author: Simon

customer_reviews.title: mosquito nets to the Virgin Islands.
customer_reviews.text: We purchased 3 mosquito nets, taking all 3 to St. Thomas, Virgin Islands to give to friends who are living with no power, no ceiling fans to keep the mosquitos from landing at night. Our friends will be very happy to hang these nets over their beds. The humid air and 88 deg temps bread mosquitos.
customer_reviews.author: amazon

customer_reviews.title: Mossy net adds atmosphere to Southern California outdoor living
customer_reviews.text: This is the second net I have bought -- and would not even consider buying from anyone else but Timbuktoo. Their nets are the nicest I've seen -- and having lived in Asia for many years I have seen many nets. The silky fabric around the bottom allows me to tuck in the net so it doesn't blow in the wind.The 2 openings means its easy to get in and out. It looks great and provides an air of mystery to my South East Asian themed outdoor area. When I get everything finished, I'll send a picture.
customer_reviews.author: Nora

customer_reviews.title: hate the 2 openings
customer_reviews.text: I hate the 2 openings because mosquitos can come in! I hope they either eliminate 1 opening or give the choice of purchasing 1 or 2 openings
customer_reviews.author: Lucrecia Tabush

customer_reviews.title: They love them! You can't beat the price
customer_reviews.text: Bought 2 to go along with some curtain lights I got for my daughters to decorate their rooms with. They love them! You can't beat the price! I am thinking about buying a few more for when I go visit family in Vietnam.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn K. Huynh

customer_reviews.title: Looks great!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this as a canopy for my daughters day bed. I was a little worried when I opened the package, because its a legit mosquito net. But it hangs easily, looks great in her room, and has held up well for the three months that we've used it.
customer_reviews.author: Angel Phillips

customer_reviews.title: Works like a charm and looks really nice.
customer_reviews.text: Does the deed and looks lovely around the bed. I still use it even though it's winter and mosquitoes season is over. I decorated it with butterflies which makes it look even more quaint.
customer_reviews.author: BrooklynO

customer_reviews.title: Best bet I have owned.
customer_reviews.text: Great net, we actually used it for camping and it was perfect. It packs down small, in its own bag, and is very light. I am actually buying another. I have owned several nets because of travels to Africa and this one is probably the easiest to work with. I like the top center ring, it makes it sure easy to hang.
customer_reviews.author: John Manning

customer_reviews.title: Best Mosquito Net!
customer_reviews.text: We’ve gone through a lot of mosquito nets through the years, as we sleep outside all summer long. This is by far the best mosquito net we have ever used. The hemmed bottom makes it very easy to tuck in around the bed, and the hanging apparatus is thoughtfully integrated. And we love the hanging loop on the inside!
customer_reviews.author: Amy Cooke

customer_reviews.title: This net is a good solution!
customer_reviews.text: I admit I was desperate. Tried a few kinds of mosquito repellent, clothes softener sheets, mosquito zapper, and my two hands to kill mosquitos. But none worked. This net is a good solution!
customer_reviews.author: H. Ling

customer_reviews.title: Very good. I received it in a very practical bag
customer_reviews.text: Very good. I received it in a very practical bag, very useful in case of travel or storage. The net ring is foldable to take little place. When open it's 65 cm of diameter, large enough to let the net stay away from you in the bed. The net is made of good material, with two opening, largely overlapped on the ring. I leave in the Caribbean, and this is very useful. I recommend
customer_reviews.author: Giovanni

customer_reviews.title: and the collapsable case for very easy storage. I sleep so soundly knowing that I ...
customer_reviews.text: This mosquito net is practical, elegant, and high quality. I appreciated the simple set-up process, the two openings, and the collapsable case for very easy storage. I sleep so soundly knowing that I won't be harassed by tiny bloodsuckers. Truly a gem in an Amazon world that is now inundated with shabby products.
customer_reviews.author: Murphy Austin

customer_reviews.title: It's a dream come true!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter has wanted to have her bed draped in curtains for years, but it always seemed such a big project. This mosquito net went up in a flash and gave her the boho-chic look she craved. It comes in a handy carrying case, so she can take it with her to college, too.
customer_reviews.author: Kay S Carter

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: Loved this to go over bed or outside area in the summer.
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: We didn't use your netting for a bed, we use it over our Jacuzzi to keep bees and flies off of us.
customer_reviews.text: This net is well made and looks very nice but we use it outside for insect shield for our Jacuzzi. One thing I wish it had is little weights in the hem like some curtains do. For us it really helps keep bees away from us when we're in the water, our jacuzzi is kept cool because we live in the desert and it's used like a mini pool.
customer_reviews.author: Darlene E.

customer_reviews.title: Happy happy happy
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with the product, it is what it is. Easy to install, and looks great. Not heavy, yet it is sturdy enough. I would recommend, adds a touch of elegance.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: This product is perfect. Better than I imagined. Easy to install.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda Dewitt

customer_reviews.title: Works
customer_reviews.text: Works. A little hard to fold and put away back inside it bag though.
customer_reviews.author: Gideon Hansen

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely LOVE IT!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is just the net I was looking for.... And I love that you can easily adjust the height. Super easy to install and great quality. I used it to creat a butterfly 🦋 reading nook in my kindergarten classroom.... My kids LOVE IT (and it gets them excited about reading)!!! Two thumbs up! 👍👍
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl Gruver

customer_reviews.title: Trusting your word
customer_reviews.text: I haven’t taken them out of the box and won’t be until May 2019 when I head to northern Minnesota.. I’m taking your word for it, Nigel.
customer_reviews.author: Madalynne

customer_reviews.title: Nice product - except for the 8 inch rip
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product - except for the 8 inch rip in the middle of it. I'm using this as a reading/rest area for our granddaughter so I'm keeping it, but if I had ordered this to actually keep mosquitoes out - it would've been a truly useless product. It appears they, or someone, attempted to "repair" the rip (I guess) but good grief, what a lousy job.
customer_reviews.author: Jay C Sumerlin

product_meta.title: Timbuktoo Mosquito Nets Luxury Mosquito NET - for King to Single Size Beds Quick and Easy Installation System - Unique Internal Loop - 2 Entries - Ripstop Stuff Sack - No Added Chemicals.
feature_bullets: EXTRA LARGE — Guaranteed to fit all sizes of beds from King, Double to Single — the biggest canopy net sold on Amazon — Premium features - Two entries - Night-light loop - Extra strong stitching - Easy hanging system - Protective skirt to prevent rips.
2 OPENINGS — Generously overlap on each side of the bed, so you won't wake up your partner crawling over them in the middle of the night.

NIGHT-LIGHT LOOP — to hang a lamp or fan, so you don't have to leave the net to turn out the light (and get eaten alive). This loop is also essential if you want to hang a baby's mobile inside the net. We’ve added a free carabiner to use with this loop.

QUICK INSTALLATION — No messing with untying knots — So simple, a toddler could do it — With the pre-installed hanging kit it only takes seconds to hang our net. No assembly skill required — A quick twist collapses the pop-open-hoop, making our king size net small and compact to fit easily in your overhead luggage using our complimentary stuff sack.
YOUR SATISFACTION GUARANTEED — if you are dissatisfied with your mosquito net in any way we have a 30 day money back refund policy. So you can buy with confidence and risk free.
